allowClear.description: Show clear button, effective in multiple mode only.
allowClear.description_zh: 支持清除, 单选模式有效

backfill.description: backfill selected item the input when using keyboard
backfill.description_zh: 使用键盘选择选项的时候把选中项回填到输入框中

defaultActiveFirstOption.description: Whether to highlight the first option by default.
defaultActiveFirstOption.description_zh: 是否默认高亮第一个选项。

defaultOpen.description_zh: 是否默认展开下拉菜单

:dropdownMenuStyle.description: additional style applied to dropdown menu

:filterOption.description: If true, filter options by input, if function, filter options against it. The function will receive two arguments, inputValue and option, if the function returns true, the option will be included in the filtered set; Otherwise, it will be excluded.
:filterOption.description_zh: 是否根据输入项进行筛选。当其为一个函数时，会接收 `inputValue` `option` 两个参数，当 `option` 符合筛选条件时，应返回 `true`，反之则返回 `false`。

v-model.type: string | string[]|{ key: string, label: string | vNodes }|Array<{ key: string, label: string | vNodes }>

:optionLabelProp.description: Which prop value of option will render as content of select.
:optionLabelProp.description_zh: 回填到选择框的 Option 的属性值，默认是 Option 的子元素。比如在子元素需要高亮效果时，此值可以设为 value。

events.name: change
events.description: Called when select an option or input value change, or value of input is changed
events.description_zh: 选中 option，或 input 的 value 变化时，调用此函数

events.name: search
events.description_zh: 搜索补全项的时候调用

events.name: select
events.description: Called when selected, the parameter is the value value of the selected item
events.description_zh: 被选中时调用，参数为选中项的 value 值
